desc: CMFabricating is a full service metal fabrication company that is local to Kansas City and veteran owned. We design, cut, bend, weld, and powder coat steel in house to have the fastest turnaround time possible. We do everything from small signs to large commercial projects.

layout.text: CM Fabricating is a full service metal fabrication company that is local to Kansas City and veteran owned. We design, cut, bend, weld, and powder coat our products in house, enabling us to have the fastest turnaround time possible. We also do laser etching of metal, wood, glass, and several other materials. We do everything from small signs to large commercial projects. We use a state of the art ShopSabre CNC High Definition Plasma cutter, a CNC Tube Plasma cutter, an OmTech 100 watt CO2 laser engraver, and high quality materials to provide a superior product to our customers. We have AWS certified welders that are skilled at ARC, MIG, TIG and pipe welding. Our design engineers use 2D and 3D modeling software. We hand polish and powder coat in house to provide high quality finished products.
